author: stefan2
msg: Make the last sub-command, "combine ranges", part of the common
normalization processor.  We can now combine any of those functions
freely.  The only thing left to add is UI for it.
(svn_min__combine_ranges): The default processor is good enough now.
(shorten_lines): Same. Only process a single node's m/i and only
do it when activated. Report progress nicely.

author: kwright
msg: Add plumbing for authority checking throughout API

author: stefan2
msg: Make the "clear obsoletes" logic part of the common mergeinfo processor.
(svn_min__clear_obsolete): The default processor now does the right thing.
Make it a no-op if the functionality has not
(default_processor): Invoke the new sub-command functionality where needed.

author: elecharny
msg: Added a method to check that an attributeType name is valid
